response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and efficiency, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to elevate their capabilities.

Considering its exceptional quality and the numerous benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you for $1,200,000, a generous discount from its market value. This opportunity not only presents a substantial saving but also ensures that you acquire a high-quality product directly from us, bypassing any additional costs that might be incurred through other channels.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this investment will prove to be highly beneficial for you in the long run. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
